scripts.dev:electron: wait-on dist/main/main.js tcp:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac dmg zip --publish never
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win msi nsis --publish never
scripts.release:desktop:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac dmg zip --publish always
scripts.release:desktop:win: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --win msi nsis --publish always
scripts.release:desktop:all: npm run build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.yml --mac dmg zip --win msi nsis --publish always
